title: An in Vivo Comparison of the Debridement Efficacy of Needle Irrigation and Ultrasonic Root Canal Irrigation Techniques

operands.value: Pts have current treatment plan at OHSU for extraction of some or all of remaining teeth and scheduled for delivery of a removable appliance post extraction
Teeth used are able to be isolated with rubber dam
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
No current treatment plan at OHSU
Severely carious teeth resulting in inability to isolate for procedure
Unable to understand or sign consent form

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('ASA 1'), Symbol('ASA 2'), Symbol('Must have maximum age of 75 Years'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Pts have current treatment plan at OHSU for extraction of some or all of remaining teeth and scheduled for delivery of a removable appliance post extraction'), Symbol('Teeth used are able to be isolated with rubber dam'), Symbol('Understand and sign consent form'), Not(Or(Symbol('ASA 3+'), Symbol('No current treatment plan at OHSU'), Symbol('Severely carious teeth resulting in inability to isolate for procedure'), Symbol('Unable to understand or sign consent form'))))
